fr.jgetmove.jgetmove.database

Class ClusterMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.jgetmove.jgetmove.database.ClusterMatrix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PrettyPrint

    public class ClusterMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
implements PrettyPrint
    Used as a dynamic partial database. Holds a Cluster-Time matrix and a Cluster-Transaction matrix.
    Since:
    0.2.0

    • Constructor Summary

      ClusterMatrix(Base base)
      Initializes the cluster by taking the relations of the base as a reference

      • optimizeMatrix

        public void optimizeMatrix(Base base,
                           java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> transactionIds)
        Rebinds the cluster-transaction matrix by removing the transactions not present in transactionIds and adding the one which are

        Lcm::UpdateOccurenceDeriver(const Database &database, const vector<int> &transactionList, OccurenceDeriver &occurence);

        Parameters:
        base - Reference base to retrieve the bindings
        transactionIds - Transactions which need to be present in the matrix
